nodes.text: A Solder-blaster was a type of tool that was commonly used in the repair of starships. A solder stick was used along with the tool.

Jedi Padawans Tallisibeth Enwandung-Esterhazy and Whie Malreaux used a solder-blaster while repairing the Nighthawk, a B-7 light freighter bought by Jedi Grand Master Yoda in a junkyard on Jovan Station.
